content: if you wish to support me you can buy me a coffee 1 1 https //ko-fi com/the_garnet_leaf a delicious pie that could be use as an oven mitt trivet potholder or even play food will you choose a lemon pie a raspberry pie a cherry pie or will you make your own favorite flavor you can use any type of yarn with a matching hook and easily customized the size of the pie i recommend using a hook a size smaller than suggested on the yarn label the pattern is focus on the cherry pie red without lattice with instructions on how to customize it estimated yardage 70 m for the crust 100 m for the filling ------------------------------------------------- finished product you can make modify and sell the finish product you may not use my photos to advertise a product you are selling attribution is not legally required but appreciated photos used to advertise the pattern posted publicly on ravelry or social media are licensed under cc by-nc-nd 4 0 you may share them with proper attribution using by the garnet leaf and/or a link to my ravelry or instagram ko-fi https //www ko-fi com/img/githubbutton_sm svg https //ko-fi com/m4m42pjs2
